rules_text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
Whenever a creature dies, surveil 1, then if you both own and control Eunie and a creature named Taion, exile them, then meld them into Taion and Eunie, Twin Feathers. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Flying, deathtouch, lifelink
When Taion and Eunie, Twin Feathers enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to the number of creatures you control.
Whenever you gain life, you may put a creature card with mana value less than the amount of life gained from your graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
You may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay {1} for costs of activated abilities you activate.
